courseDetails.title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
whatYouWillLearn: Deployment with GitHub Pages, Heroku and MongoDB Atlas
Web3 Development on the Internet Computer
NFT minting, buying and selling logic
courseDetails.courseDescription: Welcome to the Complete Web Development Bootcamp, the only course you need to learn to code and become a full-stack web developer. The course includes over 65 hours of HD video tutorials and builds your programming knowledge while making real-world websites and web apps.
courseDetails.outcome: By the end of this course, you will be fluently programming and be ready to make any website you can dream of. You'll also build a portfolio of over 32+ websites that you can show off to any potential employer.
projects: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.
technologies: Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node, and even Web3 development.
skillsAcquired: After the course, you will be able to build ANY website you want.
Build fully-fledged websites and web apps for your startup or business.
Work as a freelance web developer.
requirements: No programming experience needed - I'll teach you everything you need to know.
A computer with access to the internet.
I'll walk you through, step-by-step how to get all the software installed and set up.

courseDetails.title: Python Programming for Beginners
courseDetails.courseDescription: Embark on a journey to learn Python programming from scratch and build practical applications.
courseDetails.outcome: Upon completion, you'll have the skills to develop Python applications for various purposes.
projects: Create a personal portfolio website using Flask.
skillsAcquired: Understand the fundamentals of Python programming.
Implement web scraping and API integration.
requirements: Access to a computer with an internet connection.

courseDetails.title: Front-End Development Masterclass
courseDetails.courseDescription: Join our Front-End Development Masterclass to become proficient in building modern and responsive user interfaces.
courseDetails.outcome: Upon completion, you'll be equipped to create visually stunning and user-friendly websites.
projects: Develop a portfolio of 10 interactive web projects.
skillsAcquired: Master the art of responsive web design.
Create dynamic and interactive user interfaces with React.js.
Understand best practices for web accessibility.
requirements: Basic understanding of HTML and CSS.
